front.title: Standard for High Performance Serial Bus (High Speed Supplement)]
front.abstract: Supplemental information for a high-speed serial bus that integrates well with most IEEE standard 32-bit and 64-bit parallel buses is specified. It is intended to extend the usefulness of a low-cost interconnect between external peripherals. This standard follows the IEEE Std 1212 â„¢-2001 Command and Status Register (CSR) architecture.
